# Invitation to Tender: Electromechanical Upgrade at the Antenna Support Building in Saskatoon
=============================================

The Canadian Space Agency (CSA) invites tenders from qualified contractors to carry out an electromechanical upgrade at the Antenna Support Building in Saskatoon, Saskatchewan.

## Project Overview

The CSA is seeking a general contractor to provide electromechanical services to upgrade the Antenna Support Building. The services include upgrading the electrical and mechanical systems to meet current standards.

## Invitation Details

* Solicitation Number: 9F030-22-0121
* Tender Closing Date: October 28, 2022 at 16:00 (CST)
* Invitation URL: Not available
* Attachments:
	+ Drawings and specifications (electrical)
	+ Drawings and specifications (mechanical)
	+ Invitation to Tender (electromechanical upgrade)
	+ Amendment 1 (electromechanical upgrade)
	+ Amendment 2 (electromechanical upgrade)

## Eligibility and Evaluation

This project is conditionally reserved for Aboriginal contractors under the Procurement Strategy for Aboriginal Business (PSAB). Both Aboriginal and non-Aboriginal contractors are invited to submit bids. The evaluation process is outlined in Part 4 of the tender document.

## Site Visit

A site visit has been arranged for October 12, 2022 at 1:00 pm (CST) at 305 Resources Row, Saskatoon, SK S7N 4V4. Bidders must confirm attendance with the Contracting Authority by October 7, 2022.

## Contact Information

* Contact Person: Sok, Sophorn
* Email: [sophorn.sok@asc-csa.gc.ca](mailto:sophorn.sok@asc-csa.gc.ca)
* Phone: 514 708-6583
* Fax: Not available
* Address: 6767 Route de l'Aéroport, Saint-Hubert, Québec, J3Y 8Y9, Canada

## Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: October 28, 2022
* Site Visit: October 12, 2022
* Confirmation of Attendance: October 7, 2022
